name: Alexander Toth
title: Programmer · ML Engineer · Composer
summary: Creative systems engineer with a background in music composition.

bullets: Constructed a machine-learning web API with PyTorch and UMAP to analyze and categorize audio files.
Built a real-time audio-reactive visualizer in C++/OpenGL, sustaining 144 FPS.
Authored a machine-learning-generated notation software in Max.

experience.role: Adjunct Instructor — Intro to Computer Music
bullets: Designed curriculum, taught Ableton Live and basic DSP to undergraduate and graduate students.

education.school: Indiana University Jacobs School of Music

education.degree: B.M. Vocal Performance with Licensure to Teach
